text: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day
author: A.A. Milne

text: Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit
author: Moliere

text: He that can have patience can have what he will
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Patience is a conquering virtue
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

text: No, no! The adventures first, explanations take such a dreadful time
author: Lewis Carroll

text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet
author: Aristotle

text: The strongest of all warriors are these two — Time and Patience
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: Make your ego porous. Will is of little importance, complaining is nothing, fame is nothing. Openness, patience, receptivity, solitude is everything
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

text: Everybody going to be dead one day, just give them time
author: Neil Gaiman

text: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane
author: Criss Jami

text: Be worthy love, and love will come
author: Louisa May Alcott

text: There's no advantage to hurrying through life
author: Shikamaru Nara

text: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end
author: Margaret Thatcher

text: She was always waiting, it seemed to be her forte
author: D.H. Lawrence

text: It is very strange that the years teach us patience - that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting
author: Elizabeth Taylor

text: I will not deny but that the best apology against false accusers is silence and sufferance, and honest deeds set against dishonest words
author: John Milton

text: Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks
author: Dr Roopleen

text: It is far better to endure patiently a smart which nobody feels but yourself, than to commit a hasty action whose evil consequences will extend to all connected with you
author: Charlotte Brontë

text: Time has no meaning, Love will endure..
author: Jude Deveraux

text: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence
author: Hal Borland

text: Trying to understand is like straining through muddy water. Have the patience to wait! Be still and allow the mud to settle
author: Lao Tzu

text: Patience, he thought. So much of this was patience - waiting, and thinking and doing things right. So much of all this, so much of all living was patience and thinking
author: Gary Paulsen

text: A stumble may prevent a fall
author: Thomas Fuller

text: Patience is the calm acceptance that things can happen in a different order than the one you have in mind
author: David G. Allen

text: Patience ensures victory
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

text: Even a snail will eventually reach its destination
author: Gail Tsukiyama

text: everything comes in time to him who knows how to wait . . . there is nothing stronger than these two: patience and time, they will do it all
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: everything is ridiculous if one thinks of death
author: Thomas Bernhard

text: The common man prays, 'I want a cookie right now!' And God responds, 'If you'd listen to what I say, tomorrow it will bring you 100 cookies
author: Criss Jami

text: We were planting seeds of change, the fruit of which we might never see. We had to be patient
author: Michelle Obama

text: If you're serious about sanctification, you can expect to experience heart-wrenching moments that try your faith, your endurance, and your patience
author: Sheri L. Dew

text: Toleration is the greatest gift of the mind; it requires the same effort of the brain that it takes to balance oneself on a bicycle
author: Helen Keller

text: In the end we are always rewarded for our good will, our patience, fair-mindedness, and gentleness with what is strange
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: The funny thing about the heart is a soft heart is a strong heart, and a hard heart is a weak heart
author: Criss Jami

text: And sure enough, even waiting will end...if you can just wait long enough
author: William Faulkner

text: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient
author: Swami Sivananda

text: He who can have patience can have what he will
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Wise men are not pacifists; they are merely less likely to jump up and retaliate against their antagonizers. They know that needless antagonizers are virtually already insecure enough
author: Criss Jami

text: Talent is a long patience, and originality an effort of will and intense observation
author: Gustave Flaubert

text: Patience is a form of wisdom. It demonstrates that we understand and accept the fact that sometimes things must unfold in their own time
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

text: I wait with silent passion for one gesture one glance from you
author: Rumi

text: Patience is waiting. Not passively waiting. That is laziness. But to keep going when the going is hard and slow - that is patience. The two most powerful warriors are patience and time
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: We love being mentally strong, but we hate situations that allow us to put our mental strength to good use
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

text: Our patience will achieve more than our force
author: Edmund Burke

text: Life it too short to deal with crazy people
author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

text: Think of the patience God has had for you and let it resonate to others. If you want a more patient world, let patience be your motto
author: Steve Maraboli

text: All men are made one for another: either then teach them better or bear with them
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: She lost her patience, a thing she was all too prone to misplacing
author: Gail Carriger

text: Aura, I'm really patient, but I'm not a bloody saint
author: Jeri Smith-Ready

text: Patience is not a virtue. It is an achievement
author: Vera Nazarian

text: I look in the mirror through the eyes of the child that was me
author: Judy Collins

text: Your least favorite virtue, or nominee for the most overrated one? Faith. Closely followed—in view of the overall shortage of time — by patience
author: Christopher Hitchens

text: I'm inclined to reserve all judgments, a habit that has opened up many curious natures to me and also made me the victim of not a few veteran bores
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

text: Patience is the ability to idle your motor when you feel like stripping your gears
author: Barbara Johnson

text: An alternative to love is not hate but patience
author: Santosh Kalwar

text: A life is not a waste of time
author: Nalini Singh

text: Maybe that's why life is so precious. No rewind or fast forward...just patience and faith
author: Cristina Marrero

text: He means to succeed, and a man who has centuries before him can afford to wait and to go slow
author: Bram Stoker

text: Patience is not passive waiting. Patience is active acceptance of the process required to attain your goals and dreams
author: Ray A. Davis

text: You're trying to eat grass that isn't there. Why don't you give it a chance to grow?
author: Richard Adams

text: All human errors are impatience, a premature breaking off of methodical procedure, an apparent fencing-in of what is apparently at issue
author: Franz Kafka

text: What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Well, we must wait for the future to show
author: Virginia Woolf

text: God will bring the right person into your life at the right time. Always believe that! If they are not there, God isn't finished yet!
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: Everything comes if a man will only wait
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: The enemy is the necessary condition for practicing patience
author: Dalai Lama

text: There is something hugely civilised about allowing long pauses in a conversation. Very few people can stand that kind of silence
author: James Robertson

text: God schedules a birthday, not man
author: Robert A. Bradley

text: Patience is the direct antithesis of anger
author: Allan Lokos

text: Patience is the essence of clicking great Photographs!
author: Abhijeet Sawant

text: Nature never rushes, yet everything gets done
author: Donald L. Hicks

text: We need patient people who are able to endure the toughest disciplines
author: Samael Aun Weor

text: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
author: Rumi

text: Perfect love is perfectly patient
author: Neal A. Maxwell

text: The work that God does in us when we wait is usually more important than the thing for which we wait!
author: Erwin W. Lutzer

text: So much of control is not authoritative action but mindful waiting
author: Cameron Conaway

text: The greatest compassion is the prevention of human suffering through patience, alertness, courage and kindness
author: Amit Ray

text: It will happen but it will take time
author: John Bowlby

text: Patience is like ice cold water runing truth your veins, but our love will be immense
author: Alejandro Perez

text: In business, three things are necessary: knowledge, temper, and time
author: Owen Felltham

text: Some people can never understand that you have to wait, even for the best of things, until the right time comes
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: Regarding vengeance and arch-enemies, one must not only be timely but prideful, and pride exacts propriety
author: Adam Levin

text: Common man's patience will bring him more happiness than common man's power
author: Amit Kalantri

text: Speed will follow when the mechanism of the movements is more assured
author: Rafael Sabatini

text: Wait long enough and people will surprise and impress you
author: Randy Pausch

text: Waiting is a form of passive persistence
author: Ogwo David Emenike

text: Tolerance is nothing more than patience with boundaries
author: Shannon Alder

text: Don't try to rush things: for the cup to run over, it must first be filled
author: Antonio Machado

text: So much in a revolution is nothing but waiting
author: Sinclair Lewis

text: Because you don't learn anything unless you can find the patience to read. TV takes that away from you. It robs you from your mind
author: Markus Zusak

text: Impatient men are generous ones. Or haven't you learned that by now?
author: Megan Chance

text: The distance of a voice, is only a short time away from touch
author: Anthony Liccione

text: ridicule is often harder to bear than self-denial
author: Louisa May Alcott

text: Don't settle for anyone just to have a someone. Be patient. Have faith and wait for the right one
author: Elizabeth Bourgeret

text: The woman gestured to a seat and put on a patient face. An impatient sort of patient face, like an impatient face dressing up as a patient one for Halloween
author: Shannon Hale

text: Knowing trees, I came to realize, understand and appreciate the act of patience
author: Ogwo David Emenike

text: I have patience in all things – as far as the antechamber
author: Gustave Flaubert

text: We must accept the reality that the causes of impatience travel a two-way street
author: Allan Lokos

text: Crushed again!
author: W.S. Gilbert, Patience

text: She will never submit to any thing requiring industry and patience, and a subjection of the fancy to the understanding
author: Jane Austen

text: What is a woman's greatest virtue? Patience
author: India Edghill

text: There is no such a rule that patience leads to salvation! Patience can lead to salvation or it can lead to disaster. Every inaction or every action is open to all the possibilities!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

text: Above all, trust in the slow work of God
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

text: Have patience with all things. But, first of all with yourself
author: Francis de Sales

text: It is important to be Intuitive at this time and allow the natural course to show you the way to the next step
author: Auliq Ice

text: An eternity is any moment opened with patience
author: Noah Benshea

text: She knew that she must sit quietly and patiently and, like her beloved butterflies, eventually he would come to rest
author: Patricia O'Sullivan

text: You were patient, but I worried that your very patience tempted Kevin to try it
author: Lionel Shriver

text: now i can get them teeth
author: william faulkner

text: Be (with) someone that promotes a healthy state of being: mind, body, and soul
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

text: No rain can't get the rainbow
author: ayumi hamasaki rainbow

text: She and Marie were Montreal girls, not trained to accompany heroes, or to hold out for dreams, but just to be patient
author: Mavis Gallant

text: We were too greedy, grasping for immortality too soon. Perhaps if we had only been patient, content to wait, we would all have forever in the end
author: Jessica Khoury

text: The ghazals are convincing, and patience is a powerful weapon…but the heart of a timid man will never win his lady
author: Fábio Moon

text: Don't crave immediate results. Take the difficult route which puts your patience under fire and upgrades your lionheartedness
author: Hiral Nagda

text: Patience is the parent of success
author: Joe Abercrombie

text: He taught me that if you’ve got guts, you can do any damned thing, guts and patience. Impatience is a costly commodity, Pete
author: Thomas Savage

text: Do not bite the hand that feeds you until it is no longer feeding you
author: Steven Magee

text: There are devilish crimes have done with angelic patience
author: Tamerlan Kuzgov

text: The limits of my patience are the limits of my world
author: Marty Rubin

text: The limits of patience are the limits of my world
author: Marty Rubin

text: Faith walks with patience
author: Isaac A. Yowetu

text: Patience pains and pays
author: Isaac A. Yowetu

text: Patience practice is the key to mastering any act
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

text: What we need is a cup of understanding, a barrel of love, and an ocean of patience
author: Francis de Sales

text: Patience was a virtue, but sometimes it was an excuse to stay on the easy path of conflict avoidance
author: Karen Witemeyer

text: The sea is softer than your delicate hands, and yet it can alter the shape of hard stones
author: Hans Christian Andersen

text: Those who are not patient enough to pursue greatness chase fame
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

text: Patience yields focus
author: Takashi Shirogane

text: Take it easy; success takes its own time to take shape. It can't be expedited by anxiety
author: Sukant Ratnakar

text: He had learned that the cure for fate was patience
author: Colum McCann

text: Consistency, Perseverance, Patience and Passion are the four pillars of success
author: Anuj Jasani

text: The greatest winners were once losers
author: Adrien Malcolm Pierre

text: Patience is a sign of progress
author: Anuj Jasani

text: Patience isn't a virtue, it's a colossal waste of time
author: C.A. Fitzroy

text: Some ideas are too big to take in once, and completely
author: Katherine May

text: Patience perseverance is the act of prayer
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

text: When patience is the only option, then journey should be joyful
author: Santosh Kumar

text: The believers are calling with the impatience of Satan for the patience of God
author: Tamerlan Kuzgov

text: Grievances are a form of impatience. Griefs are a form of patience
author: Robert Frost

text: Nothing is longer than a little while
author: Maureen Johnson

text: If relationship turn frail, it's time for listening, not just patient hearing
author: Garry James

text: Our journey towards our goals teaches us many lessons. Patience is one of those
author: Purvi Raniga

text: When you're an investor, patience is everything
author: Anuj Jasani

text: The sweetest of all virtues are found in rounded strength and warmth of heart. For what is a blessing, if not the ability to surface anywhere in the Cosmos, and, [if] not loved, atleast not hated free
author: unknown

text: Don't be in hurry. Good things take time and requires a lot of patience. Whatever significant in life comes very silently. All you need is patience
author: Srinivart

text: There is maturity in the deep silence. Therefore, try to continue meditating and mastering the Self
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

text: Change. Unlearning yourself is more important than knowing yourself
author: Brenda Lozano

text: God’s generosity is nowhere better seen than in the gift of patience
author: Toni Morrison

text: Patience is a great power and victory of the patient
author: Ehsan Sehgal
